attributes.action: Force BAA to reduce the extortionate parking prices at Stansted Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stansted Airport is situated in rural Essex where land prices are relatively low. However it now costs a minimum of £2 for 15 minutes simply to meet someone at Stansted Airport - but if you accidentally go over this limit the charge leaps to £5 for 30 minutes or £10 for an hour! I think this is nothing but extortionate and is particularly unfair on the elderly or disabled who need longer to get to and from the main terminal area - and may also be in violation of the Disability Discrimination Act.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
